episode.title: ‘Star Wars: The Mandalorian’ Holiday Spectacular
episode.rawTitle: 305: ‘Star Wars: The Mandalorian’ Holiday Spectacular, With Special Guests Guy English and John Siracusa’
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: As per holiday tradition at The Talk Show, a brief chat about *Star Wars: The Mandalorian*, with a cavalcade of special guests, including, but not necessarily limited to, Guy English and John Siracusa.
episode.showNotes:
